channel.title: Troubleshooting on Harry John
channel.description: Recent content in Troubleshooting on Harry John

item.title: Office 2016 Install -- "We need to remove some older apps"
item.description: Office 2016 was made available today to the Office 365 subscribers running on PC -- it has been available to Mac users since July. However the installation might not go as smoothly as you would expect, especially if you have some older non-365 Office type applications installed.

item.title: Veeam Backup job failed. Cannot create a shadow copy of the volumes containing writer's data.
item.description: Troubleshooting Veeam backup failures related to VSS writers and disk space issues
